content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DOSE
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DOSTXT
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: DELETE_CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0111
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --DOSTXT ^= null and --DOSE ^= null
Outcome:
  Message: Both --DOSE and --DOSTXT values are populated
  Output Variables:
    - --DOSE
    - --DOSTXT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0111
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Not populated when --DOSE is populated.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DOSTXT
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --DOSTXT ^= null and --DOSE ^= null
